modName: Gears of Fate - Alvor of Riverwood
summary:
Ever wanted Alvor to abandon his life as a blacksmith to come adventure with you and help investigate the dragon crisis? Now you can!
With him you will have the opportunity to take part in a new exciting questline revolving around the Bard's College in Solitude! Evolving into an engaging plot involving the Daedra. (Very WIP)
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff0000]                                    Gears of Fate - Alvor of Riverwood
[/color] 
                    [font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=5]"A very pituresque mod, it reminds me of home and grandma's carrot cake,
                                     Alvor is like a part of the family now." -- Legit Source[/size][/color][/font]

[/size]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]                                                       Description   [/size][/font]
[size=5][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Ever wonder why you can't get a friendly face to join you from (almost) the very beggining of the game?  Once you escape Helgen with the help of Hadvar -- provided you choose to follow him to the keep -- he will tell you to meet up with him and his uncle, Alvor, in  Riverwood, who offers you solace from the dragon and hears your story, as well as orient you to warn Jarl Balgruuf of Whiterun about the problem as soon as  possible. Now you can ask him to come along with you and help you figure it through to the end. As your relationship with Alvor evolves, you start to learn more about his interesting past, in a unique journey that changes the course of history and intertwines your destinies![/size][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]With him you will have the opportunity to take part in a new exciting questline revolving around the Bard's College in Solitude! Evolving into an engaging plot involving the Daedra and other interesting aspects. (Very WIP)[/size][/font]
[/size]
[color=#00ffff][size=5]     Features:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*][color=#00ffff]A voiced follower, a friendly and familiar face to protect you and your goals throughout your journey.[/color]
[/list][list]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]A new engaging questline based around Alvor's Past, and Skyrim's Future! (WIP, early stage)[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][/color]
[/list][list]
[*][color=#00ffff]Fully Voiced Dialogue! (WIP, most will be remade more professionally for a final stage)[/color]
[*][color=#00ffff]A new variety of creative Custom Voiced dialogue options implemented, ranging from positive and negative dialogue options.
[/color]
[*][color=#00ffff]Have fun with your new friend! Ask him to dance with you! Play charades with him! You can even ask Alvor to play the lute to lift[/color]
[/list][color=#00ffff]        your spirits, boost your imune system and allow you to recover health while listening to his song. [/color][list]
[*][color=#00ffff]Be careful though! If you treat Alvor badly, he will not take it lightly. Be warned, depending on the strength of your friendship[/color]
[/list][color=#00ffff]        and the gravity of how you mistreat him, he will not tolerate disrespect and he won't take your bulls**t.[/color]
[color=#0000ff][size=5]                                                              [color=#ff7700]  [font=Trebuchet MS]  [color=#0000ff]Planned Features[/color][/font][color=#0000ff]:[/color][/color]
 [/size][size=4]                                                                                  [color=#1e84cc]- A Full Immersive Questline.
                                                                               - More Dialogue Options for Alvor
[color=#ff7700]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#e69138][size=5]                                                         Known Bugs/ Incompatibilities[/size][/color][/font]
[/color][/color][/size][/color][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff7700][size=3]If you ask Alvor to play the Lute while he is performing an action (example: using the forge), he will keep performing the action but you will still hear the lute, make sure he is not busy at the moment before you ask him to do stuff for you.[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff7700][size=3]Voiced dialogue may be too low at times, but if you turn up your volume a bit you'll be able to hear just fine, even though it may not add for immersion, currently working on it.[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][color=#0000ff][size=4][color=#1e84cc][font=Times New Roman][color=#e69138]                                               If you find any bug please report it to me so i can fix it as soon as possible[/color][/font][color=#f1c232]
[/color]
[font=Times New Roman]
[color=#f9cb9c][size=5]Any idea, suggestion, criticism or question you have, feel free to let me know, make a post or message me. If you make any videos reviewing my mod, send them to me (if you'd like) so i can post it here.[/size][/color][/font][/color][/size][/color]
